content.description: Link-up of Happy Hour and Don't Stress. Start on the first 3 bolts of Happy Hour, then traverse left a few feet along the left-leaning diagonal crack and finish up the shallow corner of Don't Stress. A fun combination of slab at the beginning, then thin liebacking up to the top.
content.protection: 6 or 7 glue-ins to chains at the top
content.location: Starts on Happy Hour, ends at anchors of Don't Stress.

content.description: Shared start with Don't Stress. Continue up to 4th bolt before traversing left. At the 8th bolt climbing upwards to the two bolt anchor.

A great climb firing straight up the  middle of the North Lump. After a tricky start you're rewarded with more tricky edging and smearing through the first ~7 bolts, after which you finally reach a comfortable rest.

Great movement, delicate footwork, and sustained until it eases for the last 1/3 of the climb.
content.location: The line near the center of the North Lump. This starts in the manzanita about 30 ft left of Don't Stress and the other climbs on the right slab of North Lump.

content.description: Shared start with Don't Stress or Wanna Get Away. Climb up to the 4th bolt and traverse left across a diagonal seam. The bulge on the traverse is the crux of the route. Finish at the anchors for The Runway.
Slab climb that passes straight up the face on the right side of North Lump. A thin start with several smeary bits through the whole climb.
content.protection: 6 or 7 glue-ins to a chain anchor
content.location: Furthest route right on the east face of the North Lump before rounding the corner.

content.description: Starts with a smeary, tense face through the first few bolts. Then it leads into the corner and a thin lieback to the top.
content.location: Starts near the corner 10 feet left of Happy Hour
